ca.ualberta.cs.controllers

Class ForumEntryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.controllers.ForumEntryController

  • public class ForumEntryController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the data in the model of the QuestionActivity and EntryActivity. Also Controls the DataManager model and therefore what gets saved and loaded from memory and the remote server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ForumEntryController(ForumEntry forumEntry) 
      ForumEntryController(Observer viewsContext)
      Creates a new ForumEntryController.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAnswer(Answer answer)
      Apends an Answer to the ForumEntry in the model then pushes the updated ForumEntry to the remote server, my authored, and read later save locations.

      Creates a new ForumEntry with the Question and adds it to the remote server, my authored, and read later save locations
      void addReplyToEntry(int index, Reply reply)
      Add a Reply to an Entry from the model.
      void checkPictureSize(int index)
      Cross checks the size of the picture is less than 64Kb in a particular Entry from the model.

      Saves the ForumEntry from the model as a favourite.

    • Method Detail

      • setView

        public void setView(ForumEntry forumEntry)
        Sets the ForumEntry in the model.
        Parameters:
        forumEntry - The forum entry to be pushed to the model.

      • addNewQuestion

        public void addNewQuestion(Question question)
        Creates a new ForumEntry with the Question and adds it to the remote server, my authored, and read later save locations
        Parameters:
        question - The question which is being created

      • addAnswer

        public void addAnswer(Answer answer)
        Apends an Answer to the ForumEntry in the model then pushes the updated ForumEntry to the remote server, my authored, and read later save locations. Will push the updated ForumEntry to the favourites save location too if applicable.
        Parameters:
        answer - The answer to the question

      • saveFavouritesCopy

        public void saveFavouritesCopy()
        Saves the ForumEntry from the model as a favourite.

      • upVoteEntry

        public void upVoteEntry(int index)
        Up vote an entry from the model. Changes are then updated in the applicable save locations.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the Entry to up vote. 0 up votes the Questions, 1 up votes the first Answer...

      • addReplyToEntry

        public void addReplyToEntry(int index,
                   Reply reply)
        Add a Reply to an Entry from the model. Changes are then updated in the applicable save locations.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the Entry to up vote. 0 adds a reply to the Question, 1 to the first Answer...
        reply - The Reply to add.

      • checkPictureSize

        public void checkPictureSize(int index)
        Cross checks the size of the picture is less than 64Kb in a particular Entry from the model.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of Entry to check picture size of. 0 checks the Question, 1 the first Answer...

      • sortForumEntryByVotes

        public void sortForumEntryByVotes()
        Sorts the ForumEntry in the model by the number of votes each answer has. Answer with the most votes are moved to the top and Answers with the least votes are moved to the bottom.
